summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 7698, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ewing Street, in the City of Seattle, from Evanston Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, by grading and constructing an eight (8) foot sidewalk along the north marginal line thereof, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
